data.text: N yi n yɛɛn nakeli, n yi manga gbɛdɛn yiyaan to kore walaxa maligan fari naxan yi maleka gubugubu kanne xun ma. A mayilenma alo safiri gɛmɛna.

Xɛmɛn naxan yi maxidixi taa dugini, Ala yi a fala na xa, a naxa, “Sa so san digilinxine longonna ra naxanye maleka gubugubu kanne labe ra, i yi i yiine rafe tɛɛ wolonne ra, i sa e woli taan xun xɔn.” N yi xɛmɛn to sigɛ mɛnni.
Maleka gubugubu kanne yi tixi Ala Batu Banxin dɛxɔn sogeteden yiifari fɔxɔni na muxun yi fama waxatin naxan yi. Kundaan yi Ala Batu Banxin yinna kui xiin nafexi.
Alatala nɔrɔn yi keli maleka gubugubu kanne xun ma, a siga Ala Batu Banxin so dɛɛn na. Banxin yi rafe kundaan na, yinna kuiin yi rafe Alatala nɔrɔn kɛnɛnna ra.
Malekane gubugubune xuiin yi siga minɛ han yinna fari ma xiina. Na yi luxi alo Ala Sɛnbɛ Kanna xuina, a nɛma falan tiyɛ.
Xɛmɛn naxan yi maxidixi taa dugini, a to na yamari, a naxa, “Tɛɛn tongo san digilinxine longonna ra naxanye maleka gubugubu kanne tagi,” xɛmɛn yi sa ti san digilinxina nde dɛxɔn alo wontoro sanna.

Nayi, maleka gubugubu kan keden yi a yiin nasiga tɛɛn ma naxan yi maleka gubugubu kanne longonna ra. A yi tɛɛ wolonne tongo, a yi e sa xɛmɛn yii naxan yi maxidixi taa dugini. Na yi tɛɛ wolonne tongo, a mini.
Sena nde yi malekane gubugubune bun ma alo muxu yiina.
N yi a matoma, n yi san digilinxi naanin to maleka gubugubu kan keden kedenne dɛxɔn alo wontoro sanna. Sanna ne yi mayilenma alo kirisoliti gɛmɛ faɲina.
E birin yi maliga. E yi rafalaxi nɛn alo san digilinxin kankanxina san digilinxi gbɛtɛ kui.
E nɛma sigɛ, e yi nɔɛ sigɛ e fɔxɔ naaninne birin ma nɛn hali e mi e firifiri. Maleka gubugubu kanne yi xun tixi dɛnaxan biri ra, san digilinxine yi sigama mɛn binna nin, hali e mi e firifiri.
Yɛɛne nan yi maleka gubugubu kanne fatin birin ma, e fanna nun e yiine nun e gubugubune birin e nun e san digilinxi naaninne.
N yi a mɛ e na sanne xilima, a “wuluwunle.”
Yɛtagi naanin nan yi malekane birin ma. A singen yi maligaxi maleka gubugubu kanna yɛtagin nan na, a firindena, muxu yɛtagina, a saxandena, yata yɛtagina, a naanindena, singbin yɛtagina.
Maleka gubugubu kanne yi te. Daliseene nan yi ne ra n naxanye to Kebari baan dɛ.
Maleka gubugubu kanne nɛma yi sigɛ, e san digilinxine fan yi sigama nɛn e fɔxɔ ra. Malekane na yi e gubugubune yite alogo e xa tugan bɔxɔn ma, e san digilinxine mi yi kelima e dɛxɔn.
E na yi ti, e sanne fan yi tima nɛn. E na yi tugan, e sanne fan yi tugan, amasɔtɔ niin naxan yi daliseene yi, na yi e fan yi.
Alatala nɔrɔn yi keli Ala Batu Banxin so dɛɛn na, a sa ti maleka gubugubu kanne xun ma.

Nayi, maleka gubugubu kanne yi e gubugubune yifulun, e tugan bɔxɔn ma n yɛɛ xɔri, e san digilinxine fan yi te e fɔxɔ ra. E yi sa ti Alatalaa banxin yinna so dɛɛn na sogeteden binni. Isirayilaa Ala nɔrɔn yi lu e xun ma kore.
Daliseene nan yi e ra n naxanye to Isirayilaa Ala bun ma Kebari baan dɛ, n yi a kolon a maleka gubugubu kanne nan yi e ra.
Yɛtagi naanin nan yi e birin ma, e nun gubugubu naanin. Sena nde yi e birin gubugubune bun ma alo muxu yiina.
E yɛtagine yi maliga daliseene yɛtagine ra n naxanye to Kebari baan dɛ. E birin yi sigama e yɛɛ ra e tinxinna nin.
